scripts.compile: npm run lint:sol && npx truffle compile --all
scripts.test: npm run compile && npx truffle test
scripts.test-regtest: npm run compile && npx truffle test --network testRegtest
scripts.test-ganache: npm run compile && npx truffle test --network ganache
scripts.deploy-regtest: npm run lint:sol && npx truffle deploy --network rskRegtest
scripts.deploy-rskTestnet: npm run lint:sol && npx truffle deploy --network rskTestnet
scripts.deploy-rskMainet: npm run lint:sol && npx truffle deploy --network rskMainnet
scripts.deploy-alphanet: npm run lint:sol && npx truffle deploy --network alphanet
scripts.deploy-localGanache: npm run lint:sol && npx truffle deploy --network ganache
